name: ep_user_pads
description: With the user_pads plugin it's possible to create password saved pads in groups. It's a User-Management System. It allows User to register, authenticate, to create groups and to create pads in groups.
readme:
This is a user-management system for etherpad-lite

This is the admin tool for the ep_user_pads plugin for etherpad-lite. Please look at installation.pdf for further installation informations. 

The frontend plugin for the user-management system can be found at

https://github.com/llttugraz/ep_user_pads/

INSTALL
=======

1) npm install ep_user_pads
2) You can visit http://youretherpad//admin/plugins. Search for user_pad - click on install and the plugin works.
(see also https://github.com/Pita/etherpad-lite/wiki/Creating-a-plugin   [Step 5 Install plugin])

Please look at the installation.pdf on github for further installation information.
